thread.title: Four Israeli cities, citing security, ban Arab workers from schools
thread.title_full: Four Israeli cities, citing security, ban Arab workers from schools

title: Four Israeli cities, citing security, ban Arab workers from schools
text:
Four Israeli cities, citing security, ban Arab workers from schools 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - At least four Israeli cities, including the commercial capital Tel Aviv, have banned Arab laborers from their schools,...
